function: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
static_description: The application features a clean interface with a linen background and maroon-colored interactive components. It includes sections for product search, nutrition analysis, and packaging design.

resource_dependency.food_nutrition_table_schema: Table name: food_nutritions; Columns: id (SERIAL PRIMARY KEY), food_name (VARCHAR(255)), calories (FLOAT), fat_g (FLOAT), carbs_g (FLOAT), protein_g (FLOAT), sodium_mg (FLOAT), created_at (TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.ingredient_table_schema: Table name: ingredients; Columns: id (SERIAL PRIMARY KEY), ingredient_name (VARCHAR(255)), base_calories_per_100g (FLOAT), base_fat_g (FLOAT), base_carbs_g (FLOAT), base_protein_g (FLOAT), base_sodium_mg (FLOAT)

function: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using environment variables
static_description: Backend server configured to connect to PostgreSQL using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp. Contains tables for storing food nutrition data and ingredient information.

function: A product search function allowing users to input food names or keywords to search for related nutrition information
static_description: Search bar with magnifying glass icon positioned at the top of the page. Below it is a dedicated area for displaying search results in card format showing food name and basic nutrition info.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on the search input box focuses it for text entry.
Pressing Enter after typing initiates the search via API call to /api/search endpoint.

resource_dependency.serving_size_inputs: Array of number input fields labeled per ingredient

function: A nutrition analysis function allowing users to input food ingredients and serving sizes to calculate nutritional value
static_description: Text area for entering multiple ingredients followed by individual serving size input fields for each ingredient. A 'Calculate Nutrition' button triggers the calculation which displays results in a Canadian-style nutrition facts label.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the Calculate Nutrition button sends ingredient and serving data to /api/nutrition-analysis and updates the nutrition facts label display.

function: A packaging design function allowing users to create custom food packaging according to Canadian regulations
static_description: Interactive canvas area where users can drag and drop elements to design packaging. Regulatory guidelines are displayed as an overlay. Save button stores the design through API.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can drag text boxes, images, and other elements onto the packaging canvas to arrange them according to regulatory standards.
Clicking Save Design button uploads current canvas state to /api/packaging-design endpoint.

resource_dependency.canadian_nutrition_label_template: Template matching Health Canada's nutrition facts table format
resource_dependency.label_update_script: JavaScript function updating DOM based on received nutrition data

function: Display of Canadian nutrition facts labels based on retrieved or calculated data
static_description: Nutrition facts label styled to match Canadian regulations, featuring standardized layout with sections for serving size, calories, nutrients, and % daily values.

function: A text input box for entering food names or keywords in the search function
static_description: Single-line text input field with placeholder 'Search foods...' located above the search results section.

interaction_and_states.description: Focuses the input field for user typing.

function: A text input area for entering multiple food ingredients in the nutrition analysis function
static_description: Multi-line text area with example placeholder 'e.g., chicken, rice, broccoli' positioned before the serving size inputs.

interaction_and_states.description: Focuses the textarea for user input of ingredients.

resource_dependency.serving_size_labels: Labels indicating unit measurements (grams, cups, etc.)

function: Input fields for specifying serving sizes corresponding to each ingredient in the nutrition analysis function
static_description: Series of numeric input fields placed directly below the ingredients input area, each labeled with corresponding ingredient name and measurement units.

interaction_and_states.description: Selects the input field for numerical entry of serving size.

resource_dependency.design_toolbar_icons: SVG icons for adding text, shapes, images
resource_dependency.compliance_checker_module: Module validating design against Canadian regulations

function: Interactive UI components for designing food packaging compliant with Canadian labeling regulations
static_description: Toolbar containing SVG icons for inserting text blocks, shapes, and images onto the packaging canvas. Compliance checker module runs validation continuously.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking toolbar icons adds respective element to the packaging canvas.
Dragging elements within the canvas repositions them while maintaining compliance constraints.

resource_dependency.dynamic_label_renderer: Function rendering updated nutrition label in real time

function: Real-time display of updated nutrition facts label during packaging design process
static_description: Live preview panel adjacent to the packaging design canvas showing实时更新的营养成分表.

function: Visual styling with a linen background and maroon-colored components throughout the interface
static_description: Entire website uses linen texture as background image. All interactive components feature maroon borders and text colors.

function: Responsive layout ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
static_description: Website adapts layout based on viewport width using CSS media queries. Mobile view stacks elements vertically with increased touch targets.

function: Error handling for invalid inputs such as non-existent foods or incorrect serving size formats
static_description: Red error banners appear below relevant input areas when invalid data is submitted, displaying predefined messages about what went wrong.

resource_dependency.loading_overlay_css: .loading-overlay { position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; }

function: Loading indicators during API requests for search results, nutrition calculations, and packaging updates
static_description: Full-screen semi-transparent overlay appears during API calls with centered spinning animation indicating loading progress.
